game.title: Nuclear Blaze
game.pitch: A *unique* 2D firefighting game from the creator of **[Dead Cells](https://deadcells.com)**, with all the devastating backdrafts, exploding walls and sprinklers you could expect. Fight your way through a ~secret SCP complex~ mysterious facility and try to keep the blaze under control.
game.features: - **something cool** - another point - oh and one *last* thing!
